attributes.action: Make it an offence for Fleetwood Town to postpone matches against Walsall FC.
attributes.background: Fleetwood Town have postponed two matches against Walsall Football Club this season. It's a disgrace that they can get away with it, and it must be stopped.

rejection.details:
You could consider raising this matter with the Football Association:

http://www.thefa.com/contact-thefa
